alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 12 at 3:19PM CDT until May 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... Southwestern Cass County in north central Minnesota... Northern Crow Wing County in east central Minnesota... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding in the advisory area. Radar estimated rainfall amounts up to 2 to 4 inches of rain have fallen, and additional heavy rainfall is expected. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Brainerd, Baxter, Crosby, Breezy Point, Pequot Lakes, Crosslake, Nisswa, Pine River, Emily, Ironton, Pillager, Fifty Lakes, Cuyuna, Gull Lake, Merrifield, Sylvan, Lake Shore, East Gull Lake, Mission, and Jenkins.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small creeks and streams, country roads, farmland, and other low lying spots.
